import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Cancel payment by operation id.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/pix/payments/{operation_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Cancel payment by id process. This route works for SCHEDULED. If payment state is:
    <ul>
      <li>SCHEDULED: payment state will change to CANCELED.
    </ul>
    Return payment which state is CANCELED.

## Request
